creator: joerg_brunsmann@yahoo.de
text:
Currently we are running a web application on AIX 4.3.3.0 
with ibm jre 1.3.1 and tomcat 4.0.3 final. It runs ok
for most of the times. But, sometimes it happens that
tomcat doesn't accept any request anymore and running
threads inside the server virtual machines stop. The
jvm process itself doesn't crash it just stops working.

Do you have any idea about the cause of the problem or
did you experience this problem yourself and have a 
workaround. Or do you have an idea how to monitor this
behaviour in a better way. Or do you think it's a
jvm problem only?

Sorry for not being more specific but the problem doesn't
allow me to. 

Thanks.

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
From the information we cannot give an answer. The tomcat-user list should be
able to provide more help, but they will need more information too.
